name: Hello Stars - Meet The Ball
description:
A fun relaxing puzzle with a stimulating piano beats and sound

Tap to rotate the shapes and guide the ball carefully to reach safely downwards towards the star

Inspite of the first few levels being easy, as you progress further, the puzzle will become challenging

More than 100 exciting levels

It not only seems to be challenging but it will force you to engage more and more

Download now and have some fun!
